member.summary: Extracts the text content from one page of the PDF and returns it as a string.

member.name: M:IronSoftware.Abstractions.IDocumentWithExtractableText.ExtractTextFromPages(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Extracts the written text content from specified pages in the PDF PDF and returns it as a string. Pages will be separated by 4 consecutive Environment.NewLines
member.param: An IEnumerable list of page indexes.
member.returns: The text extracted from the PDF pages as a string.
